content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts to supply a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) did not result in a placed structure, and no other built structures have been reported.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Parameter Handling
  - When invoking get_entities, use the proper parameter format. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or incorrect positional parameters that lead to TypeErrors.
  
• NoneType Safety
  - Always verify that a function’s return value is not None before iterating over it. Use a fallback (for example, an empty list) to prevent errors when operating on expected collections.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Verification
  - Before attempting to place a Lab, confirm its availability in the inventory.
  - Ensure all necessary sub-ingredients (for instance, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available to meet lab crafting requirements and avoid cascading resource errors.

• Resource and Process Confirmation
  - Verify that the prerequisite resource processing (such as smelting iron and copper plates) has completed successfully so that sufficient materials are available for crafting complex items like labs.
